title: Leo the Brave Turtle
storyDescription: A kind turtle named Leo learns to be brave on his first day at school.
generatedStory: Page 1: On an ordinary sunny morning, Leo, a small green turtle, woke up feeling scared. He looked at his little red backpack and blinked his bright eyes nervously.
